name: Tool Use
definition: Determines the tool use level of an AI agent based on its capabilities to interact with systems.

values.name: Viewer
values.definition: The agent can only read and analyze information without making any changes.

values.name: Operator
values.definition: The agent can make changes within a controlled environment, such as test systems or local files.

values.name: Administrator
values.definition: The agent has full control and can make changes to privileged systems, including production environments.
